samples.ui
Class ScrollableComponent

java.lang.Object
  samples.ui.Component
      samples.ui.ScrollableComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
TextBox
public abstract class ScrollableComponent
extends Component

This class is a subclass of the base Component class. Classes that want to be displayed in a ScrollView need to extend this class.

See Also:
Component, ScrollView
